1.title: Your Pet's Dirty Secrets
1.plot: From "booty scooting," to crotch sniffing, we provide practical solutions for some of your most embarrassing pet questions. Plus, Dr. Tina puppy proofs one woman's house, David Mizejewski shares the pros and cons of small pets like a rat, turtle, and tarantula, and one little girl gets the surprise of her life.

2.title: My Pet Ate What!?

3.title: Break Bad... Habits

4.title: Worst Pet Peeves
4.plot: It's time to settle some pet wars! We offer practical solutions for pet owners who don't pick up poop, excessive barking and more. Plus, can living with pets make us sick? We swab the home of one pet owner and reveal the shocking results. Also, more DIY pet projects, how to prevent a skunk from spraying your pet and four things in your medicine cabinet you can share with your pet!

5.title: Dog Tricks & Tips
5.plot: Would you know what to do if a pet attacked? We reveal how to protect yourself from an aggressive dog using items in your purse! Plus, Andre Millan investigates how Doggie Yoga can transform your pet's energy level in just minutes. Finally, our Pet Chef cooks up three doggone delicious DIY pet treats, including doggie donuts and cricket cookies!

6.title: Is My Pet Normal?
6.plot: Have you ever wondered if your pet's quirks are normal? If so, this episode is for you! From eating grass, to having indoor accidents and more, we dissect some odd pet behaviors. Plus, Dr. Courtney shows one family how to react in a pet emergency using items around the house. Also, learn which table scraps are safe and which ones are doing your pet harm. Then, Andre Millan visits a pet psychic.

imdb.plot outline: Set in a studio with a live audience, Pet Talk is fast-paced, info-taining, and highly interactive. Hosted by four pet and animal authorities, this show delves into everything from health and nutrition to behavior and grooming for creatures of all shapes, sizes, and colors. Got a question about your furry, feathered, or scaled companion? Pet Talk has the answer.
imdb.title: Pet Talk
plot: Set in a studio with a live audience, _Pet Talk_ (qv) is fast-paced, info-taining, and highly interactive. Hosted by four pet and animal authorities, this show delves into everything from health and nutrition to behavior and grooming for creatures of all shapes, sizes, and colors. Got a question about your furry, feathered, or scaled companion? _Pet Talk_ (qv) has the answer.
